text: is a Japanese film director and screenwriter. His film Raw Summer won the Fantastic Off-Theatre Competition Grand Prize at the 2006 Yubari International Fantastic Film Festival. ==Filmography== *Raw Summer (2005) *The Contents of the Desk (2006) *Cafe Isobe (2008) *Triangle (2010) *The Workhorse & the Bigmouth (2013) *Mugiko-san to (2013) *Silver Spoon (2014) *Himeanole (2016) *Ken'en (2018) *I Love Irene (2018) *Kūhaku (2020) ==References== ==External links== * Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese film directors Category:Japanese screenwriters
title: Keisuke Yoshida (director)
